title: 12 seconds champ select
body: I really think we should reduce the champ select time from 40 seconds to 12 this whole someone didnt pass the sitdown for 5 mins and do nothing afk check you have been returned to search is really frustrating especially when you can be waiting 30+ minutes for a game from all the dodges

replies.body: I think the whole system as it is at the moment is redundant. You should be able to change who you're planning to pick at all times. I understand this is difficult in terms of UX, but I'm sure they could figure out a way
i just want to get into games im less interested in how we choose roles if there are roles there are roles pick it and deal but its so annoying not being able to get into a game yeah
